title: Arcade comic

embed.description: Playing kicking Teemo is fun, playing it with friends is better : )This is a small donation comic animation done for the french site LoLTracker/HappyLeagueFriends. Art by HolyElfGirl

body:
Click the link to see every images. 
I spend lot of work on this, I hope you like it >___<

replies.body: This is fantastically cute - and now I am torn.  I love Sona, and she should always be happy - but I don't actually hate Teemo (I know - controversial!).  But you're right - it looks like she's having so much more fun playing as a duo.

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=JpkUyExz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-12T00:08:45.789+0000)
>
> This is fantastically cute - and now I am torn.  I love Sona, and she should always be happy - but I don't actually hate Teemo (I know - controversial!).  But you're right - it looks like she's having so much more fun playing as a duo.

You make Teemo happy

> [{quoted}](name=Holyna,realm=EUW,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=JpkUyExz,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-12T23:08:30.606+0000)
>
> You make Teemo happy

And your Teemo made me very happy too!  I showed this to the biggest Teemo fan in my little part of the office and his face lit up with joy :D
(It was an emotional rollercoaster for a minute, there, as the first thing he saw was "Kick Teemo" - but your sketch gave the whole story a happy ending.  Thank you from us both.)
The only way this could be better is if MF killed a teemo instead of creeps.

> [{quoted}](name=LankPants,realm=OCE,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=JpkUyExz,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-05-12T13:57:26.054+0000)
>
> The only way this could be better is if MF killed a teemo instead of creeps.

Ahahahaha XD nice idea
I love how shes floating too.

> [{quoted}](name=I Came For You,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=JpkUyExz,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-05-12T06:46:15.403+0000)
>
> I love how shes floating too.

Thank you
I like the flickering! Nice job!

> [{quoted}](name=WhiskerWow,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=JpkUyExz,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-05-12T03:19:00.588+0000)
>
> I like the flickering! Nice job!

Thank you! >_<
I love it! Thanks for sharing. ^^

2 grills 1 joystick
<3

Great job by the way! This is eggsellent!
